title: Albums Dataset Schema
description: This schema represents a JSON array of album objects, each containing details about music albums.

items.title: Album
items.description: An object representing a music album.

ReleaseYear.title: Release Year
ReleaseYear.description: The year the album was released.

NumberOfSingles.title: Number Of Singles
NumberOfSingles.description: The number of singles released from the album.

Genre.title: Genre
Genre.description: The musical genre of the album.

Style.title: Style
Style.description: The specific style or sub-genre of the album.

ReleaseLabel.title: Release Label
ReleaseLabel.description: The record label that released the album.

Country.title: Country Of Release
Country.description: The country where the album was released.

Type.title: Type
Type.description: The type of album, e.g., studio album, live album.

Songs.title: Songs
Songs.description: A list of songs included in the album.

items.title: Song
items.description: An object representing a song in the album.

TrackNumber.title: Track Number
TrackNumber.description: The track number of the song on the album.

Duration.title: Duration
Duration.description: The duration of the song in seconds.

Producers.title: Producers
Producers.description: A list of producers who worked on the album.

items.title: Producer
items.description: An object representing a producer of the album.

ProducerArtistName.title: Producer's Artist Name
ProducerArtistName.description: The artist name of the producer.

ProducerFirstName.title: Producer's First Name
ProducerFirstName.description: The first name of the producer.

ProducerLastName.title: Producer's Last Name
ProducerLastName.description: The last name of the producer.

Performers.title: Performers
Performers.description: A list of performers who contributed to the album.

items.title: Performer
items.description: An object representing a performer on the album.

PerformerArtistName.title: Performer's Artist Name
PerformerArtistName.description: The artist name of the performer.

PerformerFirstName.title: Performer's First Name
PerformerFirstName.description: The first name of the performer.

PerformerLastName.title: Performer's Last Name
PerformerLastName.description: The last name of the performer.
